edu.stanford.pigir.webbase

Class DistributorContact

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.pigir.webbase.DistributorContact
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable

    public class DistributorContact
extends Object
implements org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable, Serializable
    Obtains and stores the contact information for one crawl's distributor demon. To obtain a distributor demon contact, use getCrawlDistributorContact(String crawlName, int numPagesWanted, String startSite, String endSite)
    Author:
    paepcke
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getCrawlDistributorContact

        public static DistributorContact getCrawlDistributorContact(String crawlName,
                                            int numPagesWanted)
                                                     throws IOException
        Obtain a distributor contact object to use for obtaining BufferedWebStreamIterator objects.
        Parameters:
        crawlName - is the name of the crawl as obtained from the Wibbi Web page.
        numPagesWanted - the number of pages to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        distributor contact object.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getCrawlDistributorContact

        public static DistributorContact getCrawlDistributorContact(String crawlName,
                                            int numPagesWanted,
                                            String startSite,
                                            String endSite)
                                                     throws IOException
        Obtain a distributor contact object to use for obtaining BufferedWebStreamIterator objects. Uses, or refreshes and then uses the crawl directory list to find the contact information for one crawl's distributor demon.
        Parameters:
        crawlName -
        numPagesWanted - Integer
        startSite -
        endSite -
        Returns:
        a DistributorContact instance that holds all information necessary to request a distributor. If no distributor is found for the given crawl name, returns null.
        Throws:
        IOException
